#Loading data
```{r}
df <- read.csv(file = "salaries.csv",
               header = TRUE,
               sep=",")
```

```{r}
fit_model <- function(dependent, explanatory_variables, df) {
  f <- paste(dependent, "~",
             paste(explanatory_variables,
                   collapse = " + "))
  fit <- do.call("lm",
                 list(as.formula(f),
                      data = df))
  return(fit)
}
```

```{r}
a <- fit_model(dependent = "salary",
               explanatory_variables = c("yrs.service",
                                         "yrs.since.phd"),
              df = df)
```
